reference.shortdesc: The hasInstance element specifies that the contained subjects have an INSTANCE-OF relationship with the container subject. In an INSTANCE-OF hierarchy, the child subject is a specific entity or object and the parent subject is a type, kind, or class of entity or object.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The hasInstance element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the subject scheme module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample specifies that New York City, Reykjavik, and Moscow are each specific instances of a city.
